title: IRCTC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Senior Vigilance Officer Posts
description: The Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Senior Vigilance Officer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma, can apply for the IRCTC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, sel...
